author: Kacper
text:
I paid stockx 90€ for a t-shirt, the seller didn't even end up sending it to them, so they returned the money, but currency exchange rate was different than the time i bought it so i lost about 7€ in the process. 
I don't envy people that bought something expensive like Dior's for 1500€ and lost hundreds.
This site is a scam! Don't buy.
title: Currency return scam!

author: Dorian
text: The process takes to long it’s took 11 days to get my merchandise
title: The process takes to long it’s took 11…

author: Albeda Murphy
text: The app is not user friendly. The only way to communicate with customer service is via email or Live Chat. Live Chat provides “answers” that are found in the FAQ which isn’t specific to your situation. Since the consumer is paying more than retail I feel customer service; communication and/or updates need to improve.
title: Improve updates on purchases

author: Alex
text: Disgusting Company!!! Blatant thieves,, you could NOT make it up... Mickey Mouse set up.. Tried multiple times to get "MY" money from sales,,, almost $500.. Just had e-mail from "Support" Claiming reason cannot withdraw because account suspended!!! WDF... Be warned.. Use one the alternatives, plenty out there now tk goodness.
title: Disgusting Thieving Company!!

author: Jay
text: Communication is horrible, there’s no way to contact ANYONE & my package says arrived but I still don’t have my shoes!
title: Communication is horrible

author: DJ
text: Super delayed.  Still waiting for the item.
title: Super delayed

author: rick
text: literally received fake yeezy slides. They say the product is “verified” but I even called the number and the guy hung up with a quickness. After that experience I took it to the customer support and they were absolutely NO HELP, still haven’t even reached back to me about the situation yet. Completely unprofessional and totally disregarded their customer, if I could i’d rate this a 0/5 stars since this is false advertisement.
title: literally received fake yeezy slides

author: Mark
text: Overpriced, no returns allowed, merchandise did not even fit. Will not use again
title: Overpriced

author: Christian
text: I didn’t even get my order
title: I didn’t even get my order

author: Janelle Miller
text:
Process takes way too long. No reason for it.

How long can we use Covid as an excuse for poor communication.  When the order gives an expected date of delivery and that date comes and goes by 10 days with no communication that is not Covid, that is pour communication.  If you cannot handle the work load you have adjust your staffing or adjust the volume of business you conduct. Either way, as a society we have to move past the excuses and find a resolution to problems.  Covid is not the problem.
title: Process takes way too long

author: Jason
text: It literally makes no sense to charge a fee to someone to buy an item when you are already charging one to the person that is selling it. I mean you already made it impossible for people to get what they want without paying an extra hundred
title: Endless fees

author: Nicholas
text: My order was back up and delivery took longer than expected and I missed the occasion I bought my shoes for but other than that the service was good .
title: My order was back up and delivery took…

author: Andy P
text:
These guys have so many glitches in their Australian service, then when you can’t get it shipped due to glitches, the customer service is in American time-zones, is slow and doesn’t respond to your actual question effectively so you run out of time. Then when you step it out and explain to them your problems what you’ve done etc they give you generic messages back not actually addressing what you ask. Terrible app in Australia.

Update to above, StockX replies with a generic response saying contact a generic email which is the very department I’ve been dealing with. I expect more of the same but will update this review once I do.

Final update: Shipping label generated without a label, you get 2 days to ship. I contacted them and they responded 2 days later, sent the label and extended my shipping for 2 days. I shipped it on the morning of the 2nd day. I get a cancellation email 6 hours before my “time was up” item was already shipped. I assume they are operating of their own Timezone not mine which is why another glitch, incorrect cancellation. I contact their support and round and round in circles we go “you didn’t ship in 2 days” generic responses even when I set out above and refer them to prior tickets with my extension. They told me to contact them below, I did, 10 days later, you guessed it, ignored everything I said “you didn’t ship in 2 days”… they have crazy glitches and are built for America, their support is also based there and operate on their time zones. Absolute thieves.
title: Don’t use in Australia they effectively steal your money with penalties

author: As
text: The shipping took a bit long but everything else was good
title: The shipping took a not long but…
